bike.description: OCLV Mountain Carbon w/InTension main frame & seatstay, aluminum chainstay, Carbon Armor, ABP Convert DH, Full Floater, E2 tapered head tube, integrated frame protection, internal control routing, alloy EVO Link, Mino Link, MicroTruss, 210mm travel

components.description: RockShox Boxxer Race w/coil spring (S, M red; L, XL blue), rebound, low speed compression, internal preload, Motion Control IS, 20mm Maxle DH, 200mm travel
Fox Performance Series DHX RC2 w/bottom-out force adjust, external rebound, low speed compression; 8.75x2.75" (S 400lb; M 450lb; L 500lb; XL 500lb spring), tuned by Trek in California
Sun Ringle ADD Comp, 20mm front, 157x12 rear
Bontrager Rhythm Elite Low Riser, 31.8mm, 15mm rise
